message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1200000 to you, and we are excited to share it with you. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $950000. This offer represents a remarkable opportunity for both parties, ensuring a fair transaction while maximizing the value for us. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for the details of the transaction promptly.
